posts.message:
I searched for a method to retrieve service tag or product model of a specific vendor " Dell , HP , etc... " device using command line and i found a command prompt , but this is achieved locally 
Can I encapsulate a packet with this information to a remote desktop of a website or something remotely without the permission of local administrator  or by just access this destination with the device ?

posts.description: I've been reading quite a few stories recently about how difficult it is to market an app. There's a ton of competition, everyone wants apps for free, and retention is tough.

posts.message:
Any recommendation for a lightweight responsive design CSS framework? 

So far the ones I found that are promising.
1- PureCSS
2- Skeleton

A little bit of background, I am trying to add some mobile friendliness to some existing web pages, the web app is pretty complex that rewriting it with a full blown framework like bootstrap is unrealistic, especially that mobile support is only needed in one or two pages.

which the best frame work
skelton or bootstrap ?

can't build and application in flash builder 4.6 and getting this error
any help will be apreciated

Front-End Stress testing tools? Here we go:
https://github.com/marmelab/gremlins.js/
https://github.com/BBC-News/wraith 
https://github.com/facebook/huxley 
https://github.com/Huddle/PhantomCSS
Also, a nice overview of CSS stress testing tools:
http://andy.edinborough.org/CSS-Stress-Testing-and-Performance-Profiling
